1.question: Do I need technical skills to use these features?
1.answer: Absolutely not! bzz.one is designed specifically for non-technical users. All features work out of the box with simple, intuitive controls.

2.question: Can I upgrade features as my business grows?
2.answer: Yes! You can start with our free plan and upgrade to access more advanced features as your business expands. We grow with you.

3.question: How often do you add new features?
3.answer: We release new features and improvements every month based on customer feedback and industry trends.

4.question: Is there a limit to how many products I can sell?
4.answer: Our free plan allows up to 10 products, while our paid plans offer much higher or unlimited product listings.
